reviewText: Enjoyed this movie, the story, the actors really had charisma and was a great fit.  The director, ingenious, in making a great film on a low budget, and his passion was revealed all over the screen.  I was able to meet some of the actors and the director during one of the festivals in which the film placed highly and am thrilled to this day that I have been able to work with some of the actors since.  John Schwert is an excellent filmmaker and I am looking forward to seeing more of his films.
Great story by Thomas Morgan, a very good up and coming writer and very well directed by John Schwert, a very good up and coming director.

I had the opportunity to work on this film, actually doing the ADR, sound design, and final audio mix on this film, and I must say that this film far exceeds the expectations you would have of a first time film maker from Charlotte, NC. BUY IT NOW! You won't regret it!
